review_title: Good for someone just starting their career or after a long break.
pros: The program of Lab Assistant and Phlebotomy is an awesome program unlike any other in the central valley which makes it a great opportunity for people interest in this field.
cons:
No full time positions when the work load really calls for one. No opportunity for growth or advancement.  No benefits.  Privately owned and ran so there is no real HR to talk to about grievances. There is an amazing 3rd party HR company on payroll  but where they can offer advice that's about it. So this is a good position for 
 someone just starting out in any of the admin positions or instructional.  I havent known of anyone to have worked more than a little over a year. So if your okay with a job to get your feet wet and build your resume you'll be fine at the Institute.  Pay for admin positions are very low in comparison to the other schools in the area.
